attributes.action: To create equal rights for all Gurkas who have served for the british army
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We petition for all Gurkas who have served or are serving in the British Army alongside soldiers from the Commonwealth and the UK often under the command of officers from the UK (and Nepal) and that they recieve the same rights for their excellent service fulfilling what they are asked to do by Her Majesty's Government this includes all Gurkas from whenever they served as long as they have served in the British Army faithfully.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
